short_description: Starts working quickly to relieve cough symptoms

Contains menthol and eucalyptus
product_description: Vicks VapoRub topical cough suppressant is brought to you by the world's #1 selling OTC cough and cold brand*! Vicks VapoRub is a topical cough over-the-counter medicine with powerful Vicks vapors. It works quickly to relieve coughs so you can breathe easier. Vicks VapoRub is specially formulated with three active cough suppressants: menthol, camphor, and eucalyptus oil. To use, rub a thick layer of the medicated ointment on your chest and throat to temporarily relieve cough due to minor throat and bronchial irritation associated with the common cold. Keep clothing loose around throat and chest to allow the Vicks Vapors to reach the nose and mouth and go straight to the source of your cough. Use up to three times daily or as directed by a doctor for soothing and comforting relief. VapoRub can also be used as a topical analgesic to temporarily relieve minor aches and pains in your muscles and joints. To use for muscle and joint aches and pains: apply to affected area not more than three to four times daily. *Nicolas Hall's global OTC sales database, DB6.

product_description: Pomada Dragon Strength Pain Relief Cream is the ultimate solution for those suffering from muscle, joint, and shoulder pain. Formulated with powerful ingredients, including Camphor 4%, Menthol 10%, and Methyl Salicylate 30%, this pain relief cream provides fast-acting, deep-penetrating relief to sore muscles and aching joints. Whether you're dealing with shoulder pain, tendonitis, or general muscle pain relief, Pomada Dragon’s extra-strength formula works effectively to alleviate discomfort. Ideal for targeting joint pain relief and knee pain, this muscle rub offers a soothing, warming sensation that helps ease pain in hard-to-reach areas. The muscle pain relief cream is designed for daily use and can be applied up to four times a day for fast, reliable relief from sore muscles and stiff joints. Pomada Dragon also acts as a muscle relaxer cream, ideal for use after workouts, injuries, or long days at the office. Its deep heat cream formula soothe shoulder pain relief, and promote recovery. Whether you're looking for a topical pain relief extra strength solution or simply a pain balm to provide targeted relief, Pomada Dragon has you covered. Suitable for anyone in need of quick joint pain relief cream, this pain ointment also works as a muscle cream for deep pain relief. Its fast-absorbing formula makes it ideal for everyday use, while the deep heating pain-relieving rub helps soothe even the most stubborn pain.
